source.title: Odd Flashes Of Light On The Moon Have Been Recorded For Over A Thousand Years. What Are They? - IFLScience
source.name: IFLScience

facts: People have reported odd phenomena on the Moon for over a thousand years.
These reports occurred before the invention of the telescope.

neutral.headline: Ancient Reports Of Odd Phenomena On The Moon
neutral.body_html: For more than a millennium, humans have been documenting unusual occurrences observed on Earth's natural satellite. These reports date back to times before the telescope was invented.

conservative.headline: Historical Moon Phenomena Reports
conservative.body_html: For over a thousand years, people have been recording strange occurrences they claim to see on the moon. These accounts predate modern astronomy tools like telescopes.

liberal.headline: Mysterious Moon Phenomena: A Thousand-Year Legacy
liberal.body_html: The history of human curiosity extends back over a thousand years, with people reporting bizarre and unexplained phenomena on the moon. These ancient observations occurred before telescopes were even invented.
